subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pedro Feliciano’s 81 relief appearances are tied for the most in the National League and, with 10 games remaining, are five short of the franchise mark set last season, also by Feliciano.
snippet: Pedro Feliciano’s 81 relief appearances are tied for the most in the National League and, with 10 games remaining, are five short of the franchise mark set last season, also by Feliciano.
